descriptionComponent.about: As a scientist in the IT field, I elevate web project development to a new level, using my knowledge to create systems that not only meet but exceed expectations in terms of scalability, robustness, modularity, and responsiveness.
descriptionComponent.technical: In recent years, I have been developing integrated solutions with APIs from major platforms (Google, Meta, Mercado Pago, ChatGPT, Zoom), as well as systems for medical institutions such as SBU-SP, SBN and UNIFESP.
